channel.title: Axiology on Nathan Cheever
channel.description: Recent content in Axiology on Nathan Cheever

item.title: No Quality Exists in Isolation
item.description: If conduct matters at all, if we can say there are good actions and bad ones, then there must exist an objective value â€“ an impersonal external system of moral truths that transcend changing human minds and changing material things - that qualifies our judgment of ‘goodness’. It is objective in the sense that it does not depend on our opinion or feelings about it for its being. To speak or think of goodness or lack thereof requires thinking in qualities.
